StarGeometry.Geometry: This is the Y2005 rough cut geometry. Originally it used the default tpcegeo module. That module was never updated to AgML, and so this version relies on the later TpceGeo1 module. It is a non-production quality geometry.

StarGeometry.Geometry: This is the Y2004 rough cut geometry. Originally it used the default tpcegeo module. That module was never updated to AgML, and so this version relies on the later TpceGeo1 module. It is a non-production quality geometry.
